Naadhipatyādi
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
119.
1291Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (nahetumūlakaṃ natthi), napurejātapaccayā, napacchājātapaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
